name: Tea, Hide and Seek
description:
You came to Belarus to study theater. Unfortunately, you bothered your school's headmaster so he decided to cancel your student visa, and now the police are after you. You should probably try and find a way out of the country. You don't know how to escape yet, but fortunately enough, there is always tea!

A comfy game by writer Florence Rivières and visual artist NaïLys Kaboom. We're not telling you what to do, but the experience would probably be better in full-screen!

Please note that while the game is fully developed and written, the art inside it is still on development. This means you may, and quite probably will, bump on placeholder images. We're sorry about that and are working as fast as we can to finish the illustrations, and will implement them as they arrive!
